overview: 'Veiled lies between the realm of awake and asleep; a place of isolation, where spectres wander, leaving echoes as they pass.'  Consisting of found 16mm film forcibly decayed by hand. Veiled is the result of a collaboration between filmmaker Ciaran McWilliams and musician Achromaticist. Created as a final project while studying at Plymouth College of Art.
title: Veiled
